trans-unit.source: Sets RGB color table in the DIB section bitmap

seg-source.mrk: Sets RGB color table in the DIB section bitmap

target.mrk: Sets RGB color table in the DIB section bitmap

trans-unit.source: A DIB section bitmap in which to set the color table.

seg-source.mrk: A DIB section bitmap in which to set the color table.

target.mrk: A DIB section bitmap in which to set the color table.

trans-unit.source: "dword[n]" structure that represents a DIB color table that to be set.

seg-source.mrk: "dword[n]" structure that represents a DIB color table that to be set.

target.mrk: "dword[n]" structure that represents a DIB color table that to be set.

trans-unit.source: The number of color table entries to set.

seg-source.mrk: The number of color table entries to set.

target.mrk: The number of color table entries to set.

trans-unit.source: The number of color table entries that the function sets.

seg-source.mrk: The number of color table entries that the function sets.

target.mrk: The number of color table entries that the function sets.

trans-unit.source: The _WinAPI_GetDIBColorTable() function sets a color table for DIB section bitmaps that use 1, 4, or 8 bits-per-pixel.

seg-source.mrk: The _WinAPI_GetDIBColorTable() function sets a color table for DIB section bitmaps that use 1, 4, or 8 bits-per-pixel.

target.mrk: The _WinAPI_GetDIBColorTable() function sets a color table for DIB section bitmaps that use 1, 4, or 8 bits-per-pixel.

trans-unit.source: A DIB section bitmaps that use bits-per-pixel value greater than eight do not have a color table.

seg-source.mrk: A DIB section bitmaps that use bits-per-pixel value greater than eight do not have a color table.

target.mrk: A DIB section bitmaps that use bits-per-pixel value greater than eight do not have a color table.
